songs.title: Midnight
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
You're under my attack
There's no turning back
Look into my eyes
And love me through the midnight

[Verse 1]
Anything that you want
I can be everything that you're gonna need
This can be easy
Let me drink all your blood
I'm the love that will keep you down on your knees
This can be easy

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I reflect in the mirror
Shimmer
As my glitter falls on your skin
Hold your heart in my fingers
Linger
I'll defile your soul within

[Chorus]
You're under my attack
There's no turning back
Look into my eyes
And love me through the midnight
Don't stop until we're through
Say I love you
Hold my body tight
And love me through the midnight

[Verse 2]
It's not gonna hurt at all
If you please let me take over all control
Can you just trust me?
I'll carry your broken bones
Never going, never leave you out in the cold
I know that you love me

[Pre-Chorus 2]
I would give you my last breath
Helpless
Won't you stay with me in this place?

[Chorus]
You're under my attack
There's no turning back
Look into my eyes
And love me through the midnight
Don't stop until we're through
Say I love you
Hold my body tight
And love me through the midnight

[Bridge]
It's beautiful our hearts glow pink and sapphire
Our bodies dance like burning wings of fire
We're tainted by the one thing we desire
It's alright
It's alright

[Chorus - Variation]
Don't stop until we're through
Say I love you
Hold my body tight
And love me through the midnight

[Chorus]
You're under my attack
There's no turning back
Look into my eyes
And love me through the midnight
Don't stop until we're through
Say I love you
Hold my body tight
And love me through the midnight

[Outro]
Say I love you
Say I love you
Say I love you
Say I love you
